title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 566.7 - Termination of service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 566.7 - Termination of service

State Regulations

Employees who file an election but who terminate State
service prior to receiving the exchange payment will receive such payment at
the same time all other exchange payments are made. In the case of employees
who have filed an election but who terminate State service prior to July 1, their salary in effect on the last date of their employment prior to July 1, will be considered to be their July 1 salary. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
566.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
